title: RHONY: Tawdry Hepburn
description:
This week on The Real Housewives of New York, Ramona invites Heather Thomson into the lion's den for a Breakfast at Tiffany's-themed dinner party. How does it go? Well, there's curry.

Be sure to check out this episode with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/51735492

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
